title: Error Installing
body:
I try to install LOL on my packard bell but it doesn't work .
It says i have to install visual c++ 2005 but when i do that it says a modern version of the software is installed .
Do you guys might know what it is ?

replies.body: This may happen after a reform or a new PC, and usually a Windows Update will fix this.  You can manually download[ Visual C++](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) for the component needed to finish the install.  That should fix things up!
